name: TorBox Media Center
author: Anonymous Systems
description: Mount your TorBox cloud storage locally for seamless media server integration with Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby.
short_desc: TorBox cloud storage integration for media servers.

form_fields.label: User ID (PUID)
form_fields.hint: User ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Group ID (PGID)
form_fields.hint: Group ID to run the container as (default: 1000)

form_fields.label: Timezone
form_fields.hint: Timezone for logs and scheduling (default: Europe/Prague)

form_fields.label: TorBox API Key
form_fields.hint: Your TorBox API key from torbox.app (required)

form_fields.label: Mount Method
form_fields.hint: How to mount TorBox content: strm, webdav, or rclone (default: strm)

form_fields.label: Mount Path
form_fields.hint: Container path where TorBox content will be mounted (default: /torbox)

form_fields.label: Host Mount Directory
form_fields.hint: Host directory to mount (default: torbox-data in app directory)
